member.name: T:MenuRibbon.WPF.Controls.ActionHeaderedItemsControl
member.summary: Base class for a MenuRibbonItem that can act as either a HeaderedContentControl or an HeaderedItemsControl or just ContentControl. It contains general purpose properties which have little impact on ribbon behavior or each other. could either plain button, or drop down for more menu items or a single control.

member.summary: Remark: this should be called by subclass. It will update checkable and call command

member.name: T:MenuRibbon.WPF.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupPanel
member.summary: A wrap panel that spread its child control evenly in the constrained space. I.e. it will wrap its child control very much like a wrap panel but instead of stacking row / columns next to each other it will spread them to take available space
